org.taverna.server.master.localworker

Class AbstractRemoteRunFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.taverna.server.master.worker.RunFactoryConfiguration
      • org.taverna.server.master.localworker.AbstractRemoteRunFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurableRunFactory, ListenerFactory, RunFactory, FactoryBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForkRunFactory, IdAwareForkRunFactory

    @ManagedResource(objectName="Taverna:group=Server-2.5.4,name=Factory",
                 description="The factory for runs")
public abstract class AbstractRemoteRunFactory
extends RunFactoryConfiguration
implements ListenerFactory, RunFactory, FactoryBean
    Bridge to remote runs via RMI.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

      • makeListener

        public Listener makeListener(TavernaRun run,
                             String listenerType,
                             String configuration)
                      throws NoListenerException
        Description copied from interface: ListenerFactory
        Make an event listener.
        Specified by:
        makeListener in interface ListenerFactory
        Parameters:
        run - The workflow instance to attach the event listener to.
        listenerType - The type of event listener to create. Must be one of the strings returned by ListenerFactory.getSupportedListenerTypes().
        configuration - A configuration document to pass to the listener.
        Returns:
        The event listener that was created.
        Throws:
        NoListenerException - If the listenerType is unrecognized or the configuration is bad in some way.

      • getRealRun

        protected abstract RemoteSingleRun getRealRun(UsernamePrincipal creator,
                                              Workflow workflow,
                                              UUID id)
                                       throws Exception
        Gets the RMI connector for a new run.
        Parameters:
        creator - Who is creating the workflow run.
        workflow - What workflow are they instantiating.
        id - The identity token for the run, newly minted.
        Returns:
        The remote interface to the run.
        Throws:
        Exception - Just about anything can go wrong...
